program.name: Cambridge Taxi Discount Coupon Program
program.description_short: Discounted taxi coupons for Cambridge seniors and people with disabilities
program.description:
The Cambridge Taxi Discount Coupon Program provides taxi discount coupons to eligible Cambridge residents.

To qualify, you must:
- Be a Cambridge resident
- Be age 60 or older, OR have a disability

Note: You must register before receiving coupons. Coupon supply and distribution schedules may vary.
program.website_description: Discounted taxi coupons for eligible Cambridge seniors and people with disabilities

navigators.name: Cambridge Commission for Persons with Disabilities
navigators.description: The Cambridge Commission for Persons with Disabilities can help you apply for the Cambridge Taxi Discount Coupon Program.
